p:
The structures of compounds 1– 3 were characterized by 1H and 13C NMR, and were determined to be onopordopicrin (ONP, Figure 1(B))
4 , 11β,13-dihydro-19-desoxycnicin (C 2, Figure 1(B))
44 , and 8-oxo-15-hydroxygermacra-1(10)E, 4Z-dien-11βH-12, 6α-olide (C 3, Figure 1(B))
45 , respectively. The purity of ONP is quantified by HPLC (purity >98%, Figure 1(C)).
